TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceListenerCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 提供 对象的线程安全列表。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe list of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列表用于指定的输出侦听器和集合。The list is used to specify the output listeners for the and the collections. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 此列表是线程安全的但用于访问列表和枚举数的方法不采用同步锁。This list is thread-safe, however the methods used to access the list and the enumerator do not take synchronization locks. 相反，将集合复制、 修改副本，并引用设置为在集合的副本。Instead, the collection is copied, the copy is modified, and a reference is set to the copy of the collection. 等方法， ，和修改集合中的元素。Methods like , , and modify the elements in the collection. 类提供属性以获取有关列表的信息。The class provides the property for information about the list. 它还提供以下方法： ， ， 。It also provides the following methods: , , . 此类还提供了以下方法来修改的列表： ， ， ，和。This class also provides the following methods to modify the list: , , , and . 方法将列表的一部分复制到数组。The method copies a part of the list to an array. 方法删除列表成员在指定的索引号。The method deletes the list member at a specified index number. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，它将写入到控制台屏幕。The following example creates a that writes to the console screen. 然后代码将添加到新的侦听器。The code then adds the new listener to the . [!code-cpp[Classic Trace.Listeners Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Listeners Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace.Listeners Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Listeners Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace.Listeners Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Listeners Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引等于列表中的项的数目，则会将该侦听器追加到列表的末尾。If the index equals the number of items in the list, then the listener is appended to the end of the list. 索引是从零开始的。The index is zero-based. 因此，如果你想要插入的第三个位置的侦听器，则必须调用`myTraceListenerColl.Insert(2, myNewListener)`。Therefore, if you want to insert the listener into the third position, you must call `myTraceListenerColl.Insert(2, myNewListener)`.

exception.span: 不是列表中的有效索引。

span.span: The is not a valid index in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索名称时，属性是否区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive when searching for names. 也就是说，如果这两个侦听器存在具有名为"Lname"和"lname"属性将仅查找与指定，不是两个。That is, if two listeners exist with the names "Lname" and "lname", property will find only the with the that you specify, not both.
